info: Fart and get the majority of the room to blame a different player
Communicate with only hand gestures until next turn, say a word and you lose.
Switch your drink with another player without them noticing. You have completed this challenge once they have lifted the switched drink up to take a sip. Make sure to stop them before the drink it.
Get someone’s finger inside your mouth without asking them for permission
Get someone to dance with you using only body language, your moves like jagger and the word *flurb*.
Humm Rick Flares, “Never going to give you up” song until someone either sings the lyrics or guesses what song you are humming.

Take a weird, off putting picture,(ie up your nose, or your eye really close up, or just anything that would throw off the other players.) then send it to their phones, in secret and if you can get a reaction from the majority of the group you win this challenge. (complete before next turn)
Put your finger in someone else's ear and don't get caught in the process.
Give a player a nickname and get it to stick in a round.
